articles.author: Andrea Cavallier
articles.title: Workers at Mexico resort where American couple was found dead claim managers ignored complaints - Daily Mail
articles.description: Both current and former workers at Rancho Pescadero in Mexico claim managers ignored signs of possible gas leaks and disabled carbon monoxide detectors because of the loud alarms.
articles.content: Staff at a luxury Mexico resort where a California couple was found dead claim the managers ignored signs of possible gas leaks and reportedly disabled the carbon monoxide detectors because some gues… [+8212 chars]
